data.title: Warner Music Group - M&A Summary and Business Overview
data.meta_description:
Warner Music Group has acquired 14 companies, including 5 in the last 5 years. A total of 1 acquisition came from private equity firms.
                Warner Music Group’s largest acquisition to date was in 2013, when it acquired Parlophone Label Group for $750M. Warner Music Group has acquired in 3 different US states, and 8 countries. The Company’s most targeted sectors include media (65%) and  internet software and services (22%).
data.text:
Warner Music Group M&A Summary

Warner Music Group has acquired 14 companies, including 5 in the last 5 years. A total of 1 acquisition came from private equity firms.

Warner Music Group’s largest acquisition to date was in 2013, when it acquired Parlophone Label Group for $750M. Warner Music Group has acquired in 3 different US states, and 8 countries. The Company’s most targeted sectors include media (65%) and internet software and services (22%).

Warner Music Group Business Overview
